channel.title: Editing level caps
channel.description:
I'm attempting to edit the level caps for my server but have absolutly no clue as to where it would be located or the code involved please post back with a anwser
TYVM in advance

item.title: Editing level caps
item.dc:creator: @krandolv krandolv
item.description:
@krandolv wrote:

ty for response
Yes, thats exactally what I meant!
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 27-08-2008, 01:15:43[/size][hr]nevermind,

I figured it out

I used

	public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
		int points = 0;
		int output = 0;
		if (exp > 536870911)
			return 1000;
		for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 1000; lvl++) {
			points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
					* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
			output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
			if (output >= exp) {
				return lvl;
			}
		}
		return 0;
	}

Read full topic
